There is something very wrong in the way the environment agency is resourced & practices if you have to wait until 100,000 tons of hazardous waste are dumped close to a huge reservoir, despite repeated whistleblowing from residents, before action is taken. https://t.co/S2ygY1JY5Q

urls.title: Man jailed after 100,000 tons of hazardous waste dumped near reservoir
urls.description: It is potentially polluting the ground close to the biggest source of drinking water for the city - and could cost up to ¬£9 billion to clean up
